title: kavitaiyaip-pOlE
sahitya:
kavitaiyaip-pOlE kanavinil vandAn kalai varam tandAnE


anupallavi

  avani ellaiyait-tANDi aruL veLiyait-tINDik-


caraNam    vittaga navarasa cittiramAghavE puttiLam shollil amaittut-toDuttE
bhatti maNam parava shuddha jnAnam viravap-paNindennai anbinir-piNaitta manOharan
